lead_paragraph: An article on Saturday about the varied styles of marathon runners at the Beijing Olympics misstated the year and the time for the women’s world record set by Paula Radcliffe of Britain. Her record of 2 hours 15 minutes 25 seconds was set in 2003; it was not 2 hours 17 minutes 2 seconds in 2005.
